about_the_game:
Your "fate" is your weapon


Originally designed as a multi-purpose tool, Fate has been discontinued due to its unpredictable features. Now, it falls into your hand. Use your 6 sided, customizable super gadget; Fate. Try different interactions and combos. But beware, for with great power comes great danger. You may use Fate to defeat your enemies, or you may fall victim to its wild and unknowable nature. The choice is yours. Embrace the chaos of Fate, or be overcome by it.

Teslapunk Experience


As the steam-powered gears of industry grind on, the brilliant mind of Tesla brings forth a fusion of three worlds. The elegance of steampunk and the sleekness of cyberpunk merge with the lawless Wild West. A world where one can immerse themselves in the grit and grime of the industrial revolution, or lose themselves in the neon-lit corridors of the cyber world.

Face Challenging Bosses


You will find that each boss is divided into three distinct phases, each one introducing new mechanics and fast-paced combat that will keep you on your toes. Each boss also has their own unique area that has been specifically designed to challenge them.
Whether it be unleashing devastating attacks, conjuring powerful shields, or manipulating time itself, the possibilities are endless with the versatile Fate at your disposal.

Meet People Flush Gang


Silent Jack, The Deuce, Big Casino, Clover, and Queen Maria. Fearless comrades who have joined forces in the name of revolution. Together, you will face countless challenges and triumph over them as a team. May your relationships with one another grow strong as you stand side by side in the fight for revolution. Let us stand together, united in purpose, as we work towards a brighter future.

Ignite the Revolution!


The time has come for the you to rise up and ignite the revolution! The ruthless corporation of Diceson has long imposed its will upon the innocent civilians, but no more. It is time to take a stand and fight back against this oppressive regime. But be warned, the road to revolution will not be easy. The forces of Diceson are powerful and will stop at nothing to maintain their hold on the people. But do not let fear stand in your way. With bravery in your heart and the Flush Gang at your side, you have the power to overcome any obstacle. So rise up, and join the fight for freedom. The revolution starts now!

name: Highrollers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5456 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5465 MB available space

short_description: High Rollers is a action shooter, heavily focuses on boss battles. Inspired by western and Teslapunk world settings. You're a former bounty hunter who wants to take his revenge on the corrupt corporations and ignite a revolution. Handle powerful weapons, roll dice, define your "fate”.
supported_languages:
Turkish*, English*, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
